section.p: Information related to cases where the decedents death was due to injury or poisoning.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateTime with data type Point In Time
The date and time that the injury or poisoning occured that eventually lead to the decedent's death.

Contains exactly one [1..1] howInjuryOccurred with data type String
A textual description of how the injury occured.

Contains exactly one [1..1] injuryPlace with data type String
The general place (such as restaurant, vacant lot, or home) where the injury occurred. Company or organization names are not to be used. (For example, factory , not Standard Manufacturing, Inc. )

Contains exactly one [1..1] injuryPlaceAddress with data type Address
The street address of the location at which the injury or poisoning occured.

Contains exactly one [1..1] transportationInjuryCategory with data type Code
If the injury was tranportation related, this property categories whether the injury occured while the decedent was a: Driver/Operator, Passenger, Pedestrian, or Other. Driver/operator and passenger should be designated for modes other than motor vehicles such as bicycles. Other applies to watercraft, aircraft, animal, or people attached to outside of vehicles (e.g. surfers).

Contains exactly one [1..1] wasWorkplaceInjury with data type Boolean
Indicates whether the injury or poisoning occurred at work. An injury may occur at work regardless of whether the injury occurred in the course of the decedent s usual occupation.
